oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1957-05-25 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from May 25, 1957. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Cowboy Copas (host/performer), guest performers the Louvin Brothers, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. On this show, Cowboy Copas presents the Louvin Brothers with the Cash Box award for artist most played in the jukeboxes for 1956. It is announced that this is the 920th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Cowboy Copas; Rod Brasfield; Louvin Brothers; Chet Atkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Cowboy Copas -- Hang Your Head In Shame (Cowboy Copas) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Cowboy Copas) -- Cowboy Copas introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Cowboy Copas) -- Cowboy Copas introduces the Louvin Brothers -- Don't Laugh (Louvin Brothers) -- Prince Albert commercial (Rod Brasfield, Cowboy Copas) -- Cowboy Copas talks -- Mississippi Sawyer -- Cowboy Copas talks -- The Man Upstairs (Cowboy Copas) -- Cowboy Copas introduces Chet Atkins -- Rainbow (Chet Atkins)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Minnie Pearl; Cash Box (Periodical); Copas, Cowboy; Louvin Brothers; Louvin, Charlie, 1927-2011; Louvin, Ira, 1924-1965
